descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][b][color=#3d85c6][img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2016/25/1466718892-screenshot69767-copie.jpg[/img]


This ENB is GREATLY based on the Vivacity ENB of fmcpherson, thanks to him.[/color]

[color=#38761D]Not Compatible with every Weather/Lightning Mod.[/color][/b][/b][/size]

[color=#ff0000][b][i]Installation[/i][/b][/color]

-  Download the latest ENB series, copy only the d3d9.dll from "WrapperVersion" to your Skyrim directory.

-  Drag all files into the Skyrim Directory & replace all conflicts

Edit your SkyrimPrefs.ini:
fGamma=1.0000
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bDeferredShadows=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
iMultiSample=0
iMaxAnisotropy=1
bFXAAEnabled=0


[color=#ff0000]Disable AA in the launcher and in your panel GPU.[/color]


[color=#1e84cc]I highly recommend these mods :[/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220/?]Verdant[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58091/?]Unique Flowers & Plants[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42370/?]Unique Grasses and Groundcovers[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url]


[color=#38761D][b][i]Place Verdant after all in load order.[/i][/b][/color]


[i][color=#00ff00]Thanks for :[/color][/i]

[color=#00ff00]Confidence Man for the guidelines of the creation of the weather plugin
The amazing guys/girls over at /r/skyrimporn
The guys at the ENB forum
Boris Vorontsov for the brilliant creator for ENB injection.
Hodilton for great advice and video
All ENB Modders for so much inspiration that headed towards this ENB
Mindflux for the aesthetic, amazing snow particles
Kingeric for the rain/snow FX
JawZ for the brilliant atmosphere mesh
Matso for various FX files
Kyokushinoyama for advice and help [/color]
author: ArkoSKP
